desc.en: London bass heavyweights Deadboy and Murlo step up to deliver an exclusive mix for SCR recorded privately at Cakeshop Seoul during their recent Asia tour
desc.kr: 런던 베이스의 영향력있는 두 디제이 데드보이 와 멀로 가 SCR을 위해, 그들의 최근 아시아 투어 동안 서울에 위치한 케익샵에서 프라이빗하게 익스클루시브 믹스를 녹음하였다.

desc.en: Focusing on underground club music, Close Quarters brings you that fresh vibe each and every time. Just like the club night itself, quality music in an intimate and unpretentious setting.
A savory journey through instant electronic ramen to stimulate those neural tastebuds. Each episode a different flavor.
Seoul based record collector and REGULAR and one half of the TMI crew. Playing a mix of old and future classics from here and there - occasionally the odd guest REGULAR might swing by and join in…
